title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received the courtesy visit of the delegation of Nigerians in Diaspora Organization (NIDO) Europe, led by its Vice Chairman, Ctzn Omusa Baba Ohyoma

content.rendered:
Today, 19th July, 2023 the Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received the courtesy visit of the delegation of Nigerians in Diaspora Organization (NIDO) Europe, led by its Vice Chairman, Ctzn Omusa Baba Ohyoma.

The delegation is in Nigeria to attend the 2023 National Diaspora Day celebration scheduled to hold on 25th July.

They were accompanied to the Ministry by the Secretary, NiDCOM, Engr. Dr. Sule Yakubu Bassi.
